document.full_text: after a brief interlude in new york, lance berkman is back in the n.l. central with the cardinals, reaching base and slugging the way he did in his houston prime.
document.title: the old lance berkman is back
lines_and_colors: after a brief interlude in new york, lance berkman is back in the n.l. central with the cardinals, reaching base and slugging the way he did in his houston prime.
